scripts.deploy: pnpm build:sdk && pnpm run -C packages/sdk deploy
scripts.package:change: pnpm changeset && git stage ./.changeset/* && git commit --m "feat: changeset" && git push
scripts.package:release: pnpm run deploy && changeset version && pnpm -r publish --tolerate-republish --access public && changeset tag && git push --follow-tags
